text: You calmly place your palm against your opponent. <BASH_SOUNDS> The force drives them away.
A gentle palm sends the opponent drifting backward like water.
The palm lands lightly, yet the body is carried away.
The palm releases a wave that lifts and sets the opponent aside.
Energy ripples outward, guiding rather than striking.
The palm flows through resistance, leaving no pain behind.
<BASH_SOUNDS> <BASH_SOUNDS> <BASH_SOUNDS> You press your finger into three of your opponent's meridians.
Fingers flash, locking three vital points in an instant.
A precise triad of touches shuts down movement.
Fingers land like raindrops, and motion dies.
Light touches carry heavy consequence, disabling without bloodshed.
Fingers strike thrice, and the body refuses to obey.
You widen your stance, letting your body sink like a rooted mountain, heels planted firm, waiting for your opponent to carry their own momentum into your trap.
The hands settle into stillness, waiting to answer any strike.
The stance appears passive, yet danger coils within it.
Hands hover loosely, ready to intercept and return force.
No strike is thrownâ€”only answered.
Calm becomes a weapon as the counter awaits.
With a soft turn of the wrist, your palm borrows the enemy's force and sends it back like a returning tide! <BASH_SOUNDS>
Stepping inside the opponents blow, your elbow resounds like thunder at the opponent's ribs! <BASH_SOUNDS>
<BASH_SOUNDS> Your knee rising like a crane to shatter the attacker.
Feinting high. <BASH_SOUNDS> You visciously smash the midsection.
With proper timing you flex your chest, arms chambered back, you counter with breathe alone. <BASH_SOUNDS>
<BASH_SOUNDS> Your leg lands with a resounding blow
A whipping kick crashes into the foe, <BASH_SOUNDS> Hurling them backward.
A sweeping kick lands and sends the opponent flying.
Impact and push combine, breaking momentum and space.
The kick slams home, forcing the opponent to retreat violently.

effect.message: Like the heavens you rise upwards and strike!
Like the earth you impale the center!
Like the mortal you drive your opponent into the ground to rest!
